system.notes: Must be Dedicated to Khorne to Wear. Lets wearer activate Frenzy Talent as a Free Action if they have it. Grants Regeneration(X), where X is equal to 1 per 5 damage they caused last turn, returning to 0 when combat ends of wearer leaves an ongoing melee voluntarily.
